name: The Island (itch) (ggamer521)
description:
Full screen recommended

Playable in browser but only for windows

Welcome to the island.

A game where you survive by using your surroundings.

Current Version: Beta 1.0

Controls:

Arrow keys to walk

Walk + Hold Shift to run

Q to interact

Z to open inventory

In Inventory:

Up/Down arrow keys to navigate menu

Q to select

Left arrow key for back

Click red X to exit inventory

Lore:

Your a nonbinary character named Alex. You were swimming in the ocean when you found an island.

so you decided to camp on it.

Now you have 4 weeks to survive... or else....

Use your surroundings. Gather sticks and leaves. 

Keep warm with campfires. Survive at night when the shadow comes...

Eat fruit. Get rocks

Discord:

https://discord.gg/DwqDV9qGER
